Per a C2 PC made 05/03/2013, it appears this module is :or will be used in the '''hp''' E13-1000/TPN-C109. *[http://devid.info/209196/Mediatek+MT7633E+802.11bgn+Wi-Fi+Adapter Mediatek MT7630E 802.11bgn Wi-Fi Adapter] - [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/14c3/7630 14c3:7630]
